channel.title: Imperial44 on Ergohaven's journey
channel.description: Recent content in Imperial44 on Ergohaven's journey

item.title: Imperial44
item.description: Connection Before connecting the keyboard to the computer, make sure that the USB-C cable is firmly connected to the connectors on both halves When connecting the keyboard to the computer, make sure the USB-C cable is firmly inserted into the connector Customizing keyboard Please refer to the Vial guide Caps Word function Press LShift and RShift simultaneously to activate Caps Word. This function allows you to type entire words in uppercase letters without holding down the Caps Lock key.
